name: Easy Dynamic Slider
author: majadul

sections.description:
It is widget base Easy Dynamic Slider and Customize option without any progarming knowledge.

Plugin configuration.

Drag and drop the widget: Go to widget page under appearance tab,
Drag and drop Easy Dynamic Slider widget into your side bar. Its very easy.

Features of this plugin

  • Left to right and Right to left also fade functions.
  • Option to set number of post to Slide.
  • Option to set number of contain to Slide.
  • Option to set contain and title to hide.
  • Option to choose category.

Check official website for live demo

  • Live Demo
  • Live Demo
sections.installation:
Step 1. Download the Plugin from from official WordPress Plugin Directory.

Step 2. Upload it in you wp-content/plugins directory.

Step 3. Activate it from Admin panel.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Step 1. Download the Plugin from from official WordPress Plugin Directory.

Step 2. Upload it in you wp-content/plugins directory.

Step 3. Activate it from Admin panel.

Can I add more style?

Ans: Yeas But you need manually edite.

How Can I add Slide information

Ans: Drag and drop the widget: Go to widget page under appearance tab,
Drag and drop Easy Dynamic Slider widget into your side bar. Its very easy.
Also you can see the first image
